name: The Agnietta ~The holy healer & the cursed dungeon~
name_original: The Agnietta ~The holy healer & the cursed dungeon~
description:
The Agnietta – The Holy Healer and the Cursed Dungeon

[Story Background]

Our heroine is a demure, divine healer who accepts the task of purifying the cursed dungeon.
Along the way, she may encounter all sorts of lust-filled demons.
Can you help Demyra escape all the traps in the dungeon just waiting for a naive, innocent girl?

[Gameplay]

A 2D action RPG with an overhead view.
The heroine Demyra learns new skills with each new encounter.
Her skills range from attack, defense, or status effects on her body.
Battles occur real-time as she explores each new map.
Players can fight, avoid, or be "friendly" with monsters, depending on her status.

[Multiple body-changing statuses]

The dungeon is full of perverted monsters that chase Demyra's perfect body.
Many of them want to attach themselves to her body; like parasites, they cause various status effects.
Some dungeon puzzles might require combinations of perverted status effects!
Keep track of her full-body sprite to see what she currently is suffering from!
There are tons of combinations to experiment with, so feel free to let your imagination soar! 🙂

[High-quality CG artwork and non-gameover gameplay]

All monster encounters have multiple high-quality HD art CGs.
Defeated CG scenes do not immediately lead to gameovers; players can continue despite being "parasited."
Demyra's state of mind may change depending on how many negative statuses she carries.
All monster attacks play a role, and the story can change whether she is a pious virgin versus how much corruption she has experienced...
